name: Bean (itch) (bobotsov)
description:
Big thanks to Coding in Flow definitely check them out this would not have been possible to make without your tutorial, and thanks to the Unity Asset store, this is where I got the sound effects and other things.

In order to play the game download the file, extract it using WinRaR  or 7-zip, and run the executable called: first game maybe.
